title: 08/17/2021 DPS Best of
itunes:title: 08/17/2021 DPS Best of
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Jason McIntyre, filling in for Dan, react to Tim Tebow being cut by the Jaguars after week 1 of the preseason but did he deserve the hate he got for putting himself back out there? The Pats still have a QB battle underway and the guys wonder how long Cam Newton has to be a starter in the league. Plus, Sam Monson from ProFootballFocus gives him impressions on rookie QB's including an impressive debut from Zach Wilson.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

The Pats still have a QB battle underway and the guys wonder how long Cam Newton has to be a starter in the league.
